pullRequest.title: Issue #7627: Update doc for ParenPad

nodes.bodyText: please clean up this grammar mistake: ... cases are not ...

there are 3 example
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -101,18 +101,78 @@ * <module name="ParenPad"/> * *

+ * Example: + *

+ * 
+ * class Foo {
+ *
+ *   public Test(int y ) {  // violation, space before right parenthesis
+ *   }
+ *
+ *   public void foo() {  // OK
+ *     bar( 1);  // violation, space after left parenthesis
+ *   }
+ *
+ *   public void bar(int k ) {  // violation, space before right parenthesis
+ *     while (k > 0) {  // OK
+ *     }
+ *
+ *     Test obj = new Test(k);  // OK
+ *   }
+ *
+ *   public void fun() {  // OK
+ *     switch(y ) {  // violation, space before right parenthesis
